Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: A mix of groundbreaking and sideways news greeted people who surfed the web today. On one side people rallied against vital proposed changes to the Pharmaceutical Benefits Scheme that could harm Australians. But on brighter news the Queensland state became the first to appoint an autistic leader paving way for inclusive learning and support for people of all abilities. Not to be missed the country's grief followed the death of legendary comedian Barry Humphries who left a mark of wit and humor for seven glorious decades.
